original_text: But his wife said unto him, If the Lord were pleased to kill us, he would not have received a burnt offering and a meat offering at our hands, neither would he have shewed us all these things, nor would as at this time have told us such things as these.
korean_text: 그의 아내가 그에게 이르되 여호와께서 우리를 죽이려 하셨더라면 우리 손에서 번제와 소제를 받지 아니하셨을 것이요 이 모든 일을 보이지 아니하셨을 것이며 이제 이런 말씀도 우리에게 이르지 아니하셨으리이다 하였더라

sentences.original_text: But his wife said unto him
If the Lord were pleased to kill us
he would not have received a burnt offering
and a meat offering at our hands
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 우리 손에서 소제물도 받지 않았을 것이다

sentences.original_text: neither would he have shewed us all these things
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 또한 이 모든 것들을 우리에게 보여주지 않았을 것이다

sentences.original_text: nor would as at this time have told us
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 이 시간에 우리에게 말하지도 않았을 것이다
